title: Zeek - Files
description: -   This dashboard provides details for Files, Portable Executable, and X.509 Certificate Info.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides details for Files, Portable Executable and X.509 Certificate Info.

## Widgets
1. Hidden Executable Files
2. File Stream Bytes Over Time
3. Locally Originated Files
4. Files by Source
5. Files Sent by Connection Originator
6. Top 10 File Analyzers
7. Files Received from Responder
8. Top 10 MIME Types
9. Files Log Details
10. Total Executable Files
11. Executables With ASLR Support
12. Executables With DEP Support
13. Executables With Enforced Code Integrity
14. File Types
15. Executable Target Machine
16. Executable Operating Systems
17. PE Log Details
18. Total Certificates
19. End Host Certificates
20. Chain Certificates
21. Certificates Sent from Client
22. Certificates by Versions
23. Certificates by Key Algorithm and Key Type
24. Certificates by Signature Algorithms
25. X.509 Log Details

definition.title: Certificates by Key Algorithm and Key Type
